title: The ANIMAL PLANET
body_text:
5th Annual FAMILY AFFAIR:
KATZ, WOLF Face Off!
The
ECD
World has waited an agozing ten months for this animalistic clash. Come the 23rd of the June, 2012, it's finally going to happen:
Zach Katz v. Justin Wolf
is your earth-shaking FAMILY AFFAIR V main attraction!
The Story
"The Big Kat" and "The Wolf Man" are certainly no strangers to one another. For nearly one full year, they've waged war so intently and intensely to a point of feverish boil. Unfortunately for the bitter rivals, their encounter at ANNIVERSARY 6 last September never quite made the script. But that's all soon to change.
Their Story
Zach Katz
Debut: DODGEBALL 15 | November 26, 2005
Captains Experience: Record 1-1-0
→ defeated by Kevin Fitzpatrick at DODGEBALL 19;
→ defeated Travis Mills at DODGEBALL 29;
→ will shatter the record for longest drought between captains contests at 6 years, 3 months, 2 weeks.
Justin Wolf
Debut: DODGEBALL LVII | September 23, 2006
Captains Experience: 1-4-1
→ defeated Ryan Letsche at DODGEBALL 109;
→ defeated by Kevin Megill at DODGEBALL 119;
→ fought Juan Londono to a draw at FAMILY AFFAIR I (DODGEBALL CXL);
→ defeated by Juan Londono in a
PickYourPoison
Match at DODGEBALL 142;
→ defeated by Juan Londono in a
GodMode Rules
Match at DODGEBALL 158;
→ defeated by Kevin Fitzpatrick at the 2008 Holiday Special, DODGEBALL ONE SIXTY-NINE;
→ will compete in his second FAMILY AFFAIR main event to become the first
ECD
player to headline two such extravaganzas
→ will compete at FAMILY AFFAIR V on his 26th birthday
Prediction?
If you think "The Big Kat's" tall, lean frame will hurt his chances, then you are sadly mistaken. The guy can move swiftly, block efficiently, and leap high heights with the greatest of ease. Let's not forget about his powerful right cannon as well.
On the flipside, Wolf - who is all too familiar with this type of pressured environment - has all the mental and physical capabilities as well. The ultra-quick, blocking magician may prove to be the fatal bite to his opposition. And yes, much like his adversary, he carries a deadly supply of firepower.
Will the "eye of the tiger" survive this brawl?
Or will the "bid bad wolf" capture his next prey?
Find out live
Saturday, June 23
, emanating from
Wall High School
at
5:30 PM
.
Check back later this week for the final preview!

Check back later this week for the final preview!
